remarks: Lemma for ~ fin23 .  In a class of ordinals, each element is fully identified by those of its predecessors which also belong to the class. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Nov-2014.)
statement: fin23lem24 $p |- ( ( ( Ord A /\ B C_ A ) /\ ( C e. B /\ D e. B ) ) -> ( ( C i^i B ) = ( D i^i B ) <-> C = D ) ) $.
